Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents including disposal group and discontinued operations

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from long term debt and debt maturing in more than three months
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from stock options including tax benefit
Repayment of Debt: repayments of long term debt and debt maturing in more than three months
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock
payments for repurchase of preferred stock and preference stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): business acquisition contingent consideration cash paid
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired and research and development in process
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
net cash provided by used in investing activities continuing operations
Other Investing Activities: payments for proceeds from other investing activities
proceeds from sales of business affiliate and productive assets
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale of longterm investments
proceeds from sale of other investments

Net Change in Cash: cash and cash equivalents period increase decrease
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
increase decrease in restricted cash for operating activities
Depreciation and Amortization: amortization of financing costs and discounts
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Net Income: income loss from continuing operations including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
Other Non-Cash Items: available for sale securities gross realized gains
discontinued operation gain loss from disposal of discontinued operation before income tax
foreign currency transaction loss before tax
gain loss on sale of business
gains losses on extinguishment of debt
investing and financing gains losses net
other than temporary impairment losses investments portion recognized in earnings net availableforsale securities
research and development asset acquired other than through business combination written off cash flow impact

__unmapped__: business acquisition contingent consideration and other consideration cash paid
transfer of cash and cash equivalents
